Tom is back with an all new adventure! Tom is your cat that responds to your touch and repeats everything you say in a funny voice.
Since Tom is now an international celebrity, he's moved out of the alley and into a cool apartment.

But everything is not perfect for Tom, his neighbour Ben teases and pesters him constantly.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ HOW TO PLAY Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦
Ã¢Å“â€ Talk to Tom and he will repeat everything you say with a funny voice.
Ã¢Å“â€ Pet Tom's belly or head and make him purr.
Ã¢Å“â€ Poke his head, belly or feet.
Ã¢Å“â€ Slap Tom's face left and right.
Ã¢Å“â€ Pull or touch his tail.
Ã¢Å“â€ Press the fart button to see Ben fart and Tom grab his nose in disgust. After that Tom repeats what you say with his nose closed for a while.
Ã¢Å“â€ Press the bag button to make Ben pop a paper bag and scare Tom. It's hilarious.
Ã¢Å“â€ Press the phone button to make Tom play with the original Talking Tom app and repeat after himself in a funny loop.
Ã¢Å“â€ Press the feathers button to see Ben hit Tom with a pillow.
Ã¢Å“â€ Press the ? button to make Tom pull random items from behind his back.
Ã¢Å“â€ Shop & equip Tom with awesome accessories by pressing the coat hanger button.
Ã¢Å“â€ Record and share videos on YouTube, Facebook or send them by email or MMS.

You can sell back any of Tom's accessories at 50% the purchasing price if you press and hold the recycle button on the purchasing screen.

Enjoy hours of fun and laughter with Tom.
